title: D2 Dedicated Mid Laner LFT
body:
**IGN: **AVS REVENGE
**RANK:** D2 73 LP
**CHAMPIONS:** Ori, Leblanc, Zed, Kass, Kat,

Looking for a team that is focused on improving as a team as well as individually.

Free most of the time.

replies.body: are you in nz? if so Synergy Gaming would be interested in having you

Pretty sure our team (Savage eSports) played against you last night.

Good player would recommend, bol finding a team.
thanks for the kind words. u guys played rly well.
